cached_items

  1. - object in module cache

A private object of the cache service. Serves as a fallback cache mechanism when the window.sessionStorage is not defined. It implements some methods from the sessionStorage API.

Methods

  • setItem(key, item);

    Stores an item in cache.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    key String

    Key for the cached object
    item Object

    Cached object. Note that while it is possible to cache any type of object, the original sessionStorage method will only work with String.

  • getItem(key);

    Retrieves an item from cache.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    key String

    Key of the cached object

    Returns

    Object

    Cached object. Note that the original sessionStorage method returns a string.

  • clear();

    Clears cache.
